Thanks for pitching!

Thank you for submitting a proposal to SRCCON. If you like, you can submit another proposal. If you’re all set, please consider inviting your friends to submit a proposal and join us in Philadelphia July 24-25. In particular, please help us spread the word to people who we may not already know about the event.

Reminder: SRCCON tickets go on sale May 30 and we expect them to sell out quickly. Everyone, including session leaders, must buy a ticket.

About SRCCON

SRCCON is a conference for developers, interactive designers, and other people who love to code in and near newsrooms. Join us in Philadelphia July 24 and 25 for two full days of peer-to-peer sessions built around conversation and collaboration.

About OpenNews

A multi-year partnership between Mozilla and the Knight Foundation, Knight-Mozilla OpenNews is dedicated to creating an ecosystem to help strengthen and build community around journalism on the web. More at opennews.org.
